content.question: Respond to parts A, B, C, and D. Identify the issue that the greatest percentage of Democrats believe should be a top priority in 2019. Describe a difference between Democrats and Republicans on which issues they believe should be a top priority. Draw a conclusion about why the parties differ on the issues shown on the chart. Explain how the information in the chart could be used by candidates running for office.
